concept.title: Set up CircleCI Test Environments for TestOps

conbody.p: In Katalon TestOps, you can set up a CircleCI Test Environment to schedule and execute tests remotely.

ul.li: You have created a CircleCI account with a Github account.
You have forked your Project to your Repository associated with your GitHub account. You can also fork this sample project, TestOps CircleCI sample for testing.
You have followed your Project in CircleCI.
